attributes.action: ban vehicles from being fitted with noisy exhaust pipes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i believe that vehicles should be taken off the road if they are fitted with exhaust pipes which are purposely designed to create an unnecesarily high level of noise.  The noise is a nuisance and serves no purpose except to allow the driver of the vehicle to have fantasies of being a racing driver, while the rest of us cant here ourselves think, we can only fantasise of having peace and quiet.
